timeline.message:
Update README.md

Add a link to semgrep-rules under the patterns field

timeline.bodyText: I think this works fine but how about sending people to https://semgrep.live/r/ ? Just seems easier to browse than the GitHub file navigation IMO.
timeline.author: pabloest
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -28,6 +28,8 @@ Example patterns: | `$ELEMENT.innerHTML` | ``el.innerHTML = "";`` | | `$TOKEN.SignedString([]byte("..."))` | `ss, err := token.SignedString([]byte("HARDCODED KEY"))` | +→ [see more example patterns in the semgrep-rules repository](https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep-rules)

replies.bodyText: @DrewDennison would have to comment--AFAIK that's not ready to be advertised yet?
replies.author: ievans

replies.bodyText: @pabloest I think https://semgrep.live/r/ is still too functional without enough context and explanation for direct linking. I would like to hustle this weekend on making it so it's ready and I know Luke has been asking for a new design on that page. If you want to spec it out with me, that would be great
replies.author: DrewDennison

replies.bodyText: Happy to help, @DrewDennison. We can chat off-thread.
replies.author: pabloest
